name: Bock Bock
description:
Online multiplayer chicken racing game. Challenge your friends to see who can make the most money! Need to settle an argument? He who’s chicken wins, word is final.

Features include:
- Place bets on chickens.
- Train your chickens to improve their chances.
- Sneakily sabotage the race.
- Try to win the most cash.
- Watch your chickens race, complete with photo finish.
- Features famous chickens such as Cluck Norris, Nugget, and many more.

Happy racing!
